import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-breadcrumb', templateUrl: './breadcrumb.component.html', styleUrls: ['./breadcrumb.component.scss'] }) export class BreadcrumbComponent implements OnInit { @Input() title: string; @Input() items: any[]; @Input() active_item: string; constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }
